__e: Forgive me for not being in the hospital with you.

- It means I forgive you, please come.

You better dance with me before you leave, or I will never forgive you.

I'll neverforgive you forthis, do you hear me?
I'm sorry, I was thinking about what I would do.

Sorry for not fixing the money and dropping out on dinner.

Sorry for not fixing the money and dropping out on dinner.
